name: Rick and Morty
summary: Rick is a mentally gifted, but sociopathic and alcoholic scientist and a grandfather to Morty; an awkward, impressionable, and somewhat spineless teenage boy. Rick moves into the family home of Morty, where he immediately becomes a bad influence.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.summary: Rick takes Morty to another dimension to get some seeds for him but Morty's parents are considering to put Rick in a retirement home for keeping Morty away from school to help him in his lab.

episodes.name: Lawnmower Dog
episodes.summary: Morty's small, white dog Snuffles gets on the nerves of the family, so Rick quickly builds a knowledge enhancing helmet for the dog. In the meantime, Rick and Morty decide to incept the dreams of Morty's math teacher, Mr. Goldenfold in order to convince him to give Morty A's in math. While the duo are sent on an epic dream world journey, Snuffles slowly gains sentience, which leads to a slew of even more problems.

episodes.name: Anatomy Park
episodes.summary: It's around Christmas time and Jerry's parents are coming to visit so he wants everybody to have a normal holiday without technology and without Rick. Fortunately for him, Rick has other plans, involving building a molecular theme park inside of a friend of his named Ruben, and he shrinks down Morty and sends him in there to test it out.

episodes.name: M. Night Shaym-Aliens!
episodes.summary: Aliens send Rick, Morty and Jerry into an alternate reality, and Rick tries to get them out as oblivious Jerry pitches a marketing slogan for apples.

episodes.name: Meeseeks and Destroy
episodes.summary: Morty has grown weary of Rick's shenanigans, so he leads a supposedly safer adventure. Jerry conjures weird creatures to help him with his golf game.

episodes.name: Rick Potion #9
episodes.summary: Rick provides Morty with a love potion to get Jessica. The serum backfires & Rick's attempt to fix things creates Cronenberg inspired monsters. Rick is okay with it but Morty feels partly responsible for creating a living nightmare.

episodes.name: Raising Gazorpazorp
episodes.summary: After Morty fathers a child with a sex robot, Rick and Summer visit the robot's planet, where the kid grows into an adult within days.

episodes.name: Rixty Minutes
episodes.summary: When Rick hooks up the family's tv receiver with reality-tv shows from alternate dimensions, and allows them to see themselves in different versions of their lives, they begin to wonder what they have, and more importantly - what could have been.

episodes.name: Something Ricked This Way Comes
episodes.summary: Rick is skeptical of Summer's new job at a shop run by the devil. Jerry and Morty argue about Pluto's status as a planet and end up traveling there.

episodes.name: Close Rick-Counters of the Rick Kind
episodes.summary: Rick's just trying to enjoy a nice breakfast, but he's kidnapped by a group of alternate Ricks and taken to stand trial for crimes against Ricks.

episodes.name: Ricksy Business
episodes.summary: When Jerry and Beth go away to take part in a re-creation of the sinking of the Titanic, Rick and Summer throw a party that gets out of control.

episodes.name: A Rickle in Time
episodes.summary: Rick unfreezes time, but since he, Morty and Summer have been living for so long on frozen time, a parallel dimension develops.

episodes.name: Mortynight Run
episodes.summary: Morty tries to save a life.

episodes.name: Auto Erotic Assimilation
episodes.summary: Rick becomes emotional; Beth and Jerry are hard on each other.

episodes.name: Total Rickall
episodes.summary: Meeting new friends; Morty goes ballistic.

episodes.name: Get Schwifty
episodes.summary: Rick and Morty must step up and save things; a new religion starts up.

episodes.name: The Ricks Must Be Crazy
episodes.summary: Rick forgets to check his oil, and must repair his car.

episodes.name: Big Trouble in Little Sanchez
episodes.summary: Rick joins in on hijinks, Beth and Jerry sort out relationship issues.

episodes.name: Interdimensional Cable 2: Tempting Fate
episodes.summary: Jerry gets sick and Rick sparks up the TV.

episodes.name: Look Who's Purging Now
episodes.summary: Rick and Morty land on a planet where all the citizens are allowed to commit crimes -- including murder -- without punishment for one night.

episodes.name: The Wedding Squanchers
episodes.summary: When Jerry accidentally gets transported to the planet hosting Birdperson and Tammy's wedding, the whole family attends the ill-fated ceremony.

episodes.name: The Rickshank Rickdemption
episodes.summary: Rick, still in galactic prison, puts an intricate escape plan into action. Back on Earth, which is now under federation control, Morty and Summer have an argument about their grandpa.

episodes.name: Rickmancing the Stone
episodes.summary: With the kids dealing with their parents' divorce, Rick takes them to a Mad Max-style universe where he tries to steal a green crystal from a group of scavengers.

episodes.name: Pickle Rick
episodes.summary: Rick turns himself into a pickle while the rest of the family goes to therapy. Now Rick has to figure out how to stop being a pickle.

episodes.name: Vindicators 3: The Return of Worldender
episodes.summary: While ostensibly helping a group of superheroes called the Vindicators, Rick instead drunkenly sets up a "Saw"-like scenario for them to navigate.

episodes.name: The Whirly Dirly Conspiracy
episodes.summary: Rick takes Jerry on a sympathy adventure to a resort where everyone is immortal when there, and Jerry meets some old acquaintances of Rick's who want payback.

episodes.name: Rest and Ricklaxation
episodes.summary: After another exhausting adventure, Rick and Morty decide they need a vacation. But things go a little haywire when they try a special detox machine.

episodes.name: The Ricklantis Mixup
episodes.summary: Rick and Morty encounter a visiting Rick and Morty from the Citadel of Ricks before heading off on an amazing adventure to Atlantis.

episodes.name: Morty's Mind Blowers
episodes.summary: Rick shows Morty a room filled with memories Morty begged him to remove from his mind, and things go off the rails when Rick starts restoring them.

episodes.name: The ABC's of Beth
episodes.summary: Rick and Beth sort out issues from her childhood by visiting a world called Froopyland. Morty and Summer are a little wary of Jerry's new girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Rickchurian Mortydate
episodes.summary: The president needs help from Rick and Morty, prompting a bit of a confrontation. Beth begins to suspect that she may be a clone.

episodes.name: Edge of Tomorty: Rick, Die, Rickpeat
episodes.summary: Rick brings Morty to a planet containing crystals that show whoever is touching them all the ways they may die depending on their choices.

episodes.name: The Old Man and the Seat
episodes.summary: Jerry develops an app at the request of a persistent alien with a "Do Not Develop My App" forehead tattoo. A determined Rick tracks a mystery pooper.

episodes.name: One Crew Over the Crewcoo's Morty
episodes.summary: Rick assembles a crew to break into a heist convention, then needs another crew to stop a heist-planning robot. And Morty writes a heist script.

episodes.name: Claw and Hoarder: Special Ricktim's Morty
episodes.summary: Rick reluctantly gives in to Morty's wishes to get a pet dragon, then things get weird. Jerry befriends a talking cat and they go to Florida.

episodes.name: Rattlestar Ricklactica
episodes.summary: Rick and Morty get caught up in a full-on snake war after a space snake bites Morty. Jerry tries to prove he can hang Christmas lights without dying.

episodes.name: Never Ricking Morty
episodes.summary: Rick and Morty get caught in a continuity-creating anthology device full of people telling stories about Rick.

episodes.name: Promortyus
episodes.summary: Rick and Morty find themselves in a fight against face-hugging aliens who just happen to have an M&M's store.

episodes.name: The Vat of Acid Episode
episodes.summary: Morty challenges Rick to build him the real-life equivalent of a "save game" function to live without consequence. Also, there's a giant vat of acid.

episodes.name: Childrick of Mort
episodes.summary: Jerry's plan to take the whole family on a camping trip is sidetracked when Rick gets news that he may have impregnated a planet.

episodes.name: Star Mort Rickturn of the Jerri
episodes.summary: Two Beths, a corporate-sponsored planet incinerator and some faces from the past force Rick and family to "do a Star Wars" to save Earth.

episodes.name: Mort Dinner Rick Andre
episodes.summary: It's a busy night at the Smith house as Rick's nemesis pays a visit and Morty invites a girl over. Then some stuff happens with a portal in the garage.

episodes.name: Mortyplicity
episodes.summary: Killer squids are after the Smiths, but luckily Rick created a decoy family. Or are they real? Can the decoys make decoys? Who's real? Are you real?

episodes.name: A Rickconvenient Mort
episodes.summary: Morty falls head-over-heels in love with an ecological superhero, leaving Summer to join Rick on a bender of interplanetary apocalyptic hedonism.

episodes.name: Rickdependence Spray
episodes.summary: The Smiths band together to fight an army of giant mutant sperm, and let's just say everyone would be better off if Morty stays away from Beth's work.

episodes.name: Amortycan Grickfitti
episodes.summary: Beth crashes Rick and Jerry's hellish guys night out, while Morty and Summer attempt to use a spaceship to impress a cool new kid at school.

episodes.name: Rick & Morty's Thanksploitation Spectacular
episodes.summary: Rick turns himself into a turkey after he ruffles the President's feathers on Thanksgiving, and the situation soon spirals into total clucking carnage.

episodes.name: Gotron Jerrysis Rickvangelion
episodes.summary: The Smiths get a lesson on the meaning of family after Rick cancels a trip to Boob World to acquire the fifth and final GoTron ferret.

episodes.name: Rickternal Friendshine of the Spotless Mort
episodes.summary: With the rest of the family out of town on a cruise, Rick is left to his own devices at home and decides it's time to reconnect with an old friend.

episodes.name: Forgetting Sarick Mortshall
episodes.summary: When Rick starts using birds as sidekicks, Morty finds a new partner in a portal. Is Rick and Morty's interdimensional partnership done forever?

episodes.name: Rickmurai Jack
episodes.summary: Rick's still doing the weird crows thing, but a middle-aged Morty hopes to reconnect with Rick, leading them down an emotional path in a familiar location.

episodes.name: Solaricks
episodes.summary: They're back, baby! The Smiths deal with last season's fallout, and Rick and Morty are stranded in space floating in the remnants of the citadel.

episodes.name: Rick: A Mort Well Lived
episodes.summary: Morty is trapped and Rick needs to save him, but to do so, Summer must do a Die Hard. This won't be easy because she's never seen it.

episodes.name: Bethic Twinstinct
episodes.summary: The Smiths celebrate one of their favourite holidays while Summer and Morty lock into their new ultra-realistic video game console.

episodes.name: Night Family
episodes.summary: The family discover Rick has been using some new technology that they want to try too. After obliging, classic Rick and Morty chaos ensues.

episodes.name: Final DeSmithation
episodes.summary: The Smiths dine at their favourite Chinese restaurant and read their fortune cookies aloud. Pretty normal stuff, until Jerry reads his.

episodes.name: JuRicksic Mort
episodes.summary: Seemingly out of the blue, Earth's old rulers return. They make a great case for changing the way society does business, but Rick isn't going to put up with it.

episodes.name: Full Meta Jackrick
episodes.summary: Rick and Morty remember some of their old adventures together, which leads them to a stand-off with an old enemy.

episodes.name: Analyze Piss
episodes.summary: Tired of being attacked by goofball supervillains, Rick decides to seek advice about why he's always a target, leading to a breakthrough - for Jerry.

episodes.name: A Rick in King Mortur's Mort
episodes.summary: Morty starts a war on worlds after debunking the entire existence of the Knights of the Sun and is forced to take extreme measures in order to put an end to it all.

episodes.name: Ricktional Mortpoon's Rickmas Mortcation
episodes.summary: What starts as a merry Christmas in the Smith household takes an ugly turn when Morty uncovers a betrayal thanks to a gift from a galaxy far, far away.

episodes.name: How Poopy Got His Poop Back
episodes.summary: When Mr. Poopybutthole overstays his welcome at the Smith household, the rest of the family get Rick to deal with the problem. However what starts out as a hang out of friends quickly turns into an out of control bar crawl, especially when a special guest joins the group.

episodes.name: The Jerrick Trap
episodes.summary: Rick and Jerry's minds are accidentally scrambled; they have to learn to set aside their differences to save their family.

episodes.name: Air Force Wong
episodes.summary: Rick, along with the president and Dr. Wong, deal with a situation when an ex-lover of Rick takes over Virginia.

episodes.name: That's Amorte
episodes.summary: The Smith family is enjoying delicious spaghetti for family dinner but Morty uncovers the truth about the dish leading to a horrifying discovery and the collapse of a society.

episodes.name: Unmortricken
episodes.summary: The search for Rick Prime takes Rick and Morty to the vast reaches of the multiverse where they have to team up with an old enemy to bring him down for good.

episodes.name: Rickfending Your Mort
episodes.summary: As the mind-bending animated adventures continue, Morty gets audited.

episodes.name: Wet Kuat Amortican Summer
episodes.summary: Rick gives Summer an Attribute Slider as payment for helping clean up his messes. When Morty wants it for himself, the siblings are thrown into an adventure where the term "sibling bond" is given a whole new meaning for them.

episodes.name: Rise of the Numbericons: The Movie
episodes.summary: Morty's math class takes a surprising new turn when he and his math teacher Mr. Goldenfield go on an adventure with Goldenfield's old student, Water-T to battle the Numbericons.

episodes.name: Mort: Ragnarick
episodes.summary: In an attempt to answer the age old question if there is an afterlife, Rick has Bigfoot kill him in order to enter Valhalla for a robbery. Things get pretty hectic when the pope gets involved in the situation.

episodes.name: Fear No Mort
episodes.summary: When Rick and Morty enter into a mysterious new realm called the Fear Hole, the two must learn to overcome their greatest fears and know what it's like to live with themselves.
